name: @dmidz/crud
author: David MARTIN <david@dmidz.com>
description: Wrapper of Sequelize ORM with CRUD operations & authorization level access.

scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch --force -m "version %s"
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor --force -m "version %s"
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major --force -m "version %s"
